tasks.title: Setup Project Structure
tasks.description: Initialize the Next.js project with TypeScript and TailwindCSS.
tasks.details: Create a new Next.js project using TypeScript. Install TailwindCSS and configure it for styling. Set up the basic project structure with folders for components, pages, and API clients.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the project builds successfully and the TailwindCSS styles are applied correctly.

subtasks.title: Initialize Next.js Project with TypeScript
subtasks.description: Create a new Next.js project using TypeScript.
subtasks.details: Use the Next.js CLI to create a new project. Ensure TypeScript is selected during setup.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify the project builds successfully with TypeScript.

subtasks.title: Install and Configure TailwindCSS
subtasks.description: Set up TailwindCSS for styling in the Next.js project.
subtasks.details: Install TailwindCSS via npm. Configure the TailwindCSS configuration file and integrate it with the Next.js project.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that TailwindCSS styles are applied correctly to a sample component.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Break down the setup process into subtasks for initializing the Next.js project, configuring TypeScript, and setting up TailwindCSS.

tasks.title: Implement Global Layout & Navigation
tasks.description: Create a persistent header and footer with navigation links.
tasks.details: Develop the header component with links to home, job search, job posting, dashboard, and notifications. Implement role-based navigation using a mock user session. Add a footer with support links and app promotion.
tasks.testStrategy: Check that navigation links route correctly and adapt based on user role (guest, employer, worker, admin).

subtasks.title: Develop Header Component with Navigation Links
subtasks.description: Create a header component with navigation links to key sections.
subtasks.details: Implement a header with links to home, job search, job posting, dashboard, and notifications. Ensure the header is responsive and accessible.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify all links route correctly and the header is responsive.

subtasks.title: Implement Role-Based Navigation Logic
subtasks.description: Develop logic for role-based navigation using a mock user session.
subtasks.details: Use a mock user session to display different navigation options based on user roles such as guest, employer, worker, and admin.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test navigation options for each user role to ensure correct links are displayed.

subtasks.title: Create Footer with Support and Promotion Links
subtasks.description: Design and implement a footer with support and app promotion links.
subtasks.details: Add a footer component with links to support resources and app promotion. Ensure it is consistent with the overall design.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that all footer links are functional and the design is consistent with the header.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Divide the task into subtasks for header development, footer development, and role-based navigation logic.

tasks.title: Develop Authentication & User Management
tasks.description: Implement registration, login, and profile management.
tasks.details: Create registration forms for employers and workers. Implement login functionality. Use localStorage to store JWT tokens. Develop profile management to update user details.
tasks.testStrategy: Test registration and login flows for both roles. Ensure tokens are stored and used in API requests. Verify profile updates reflect correctly.

subtasks.title: Develop Registration Forms for Employers and Workers
subtasks.description: Create separate registration forms for employers and workers.
subtasks.details: Design and implement registration forms with necessary fields for both employers and workers. Ensure form validation and error handling are in place.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test form submission and validation for both roles.

subtasks.title: Implement Login Functionality
subtasks.description: Develop the login feature for users to access their accounts.
subtasks.details: Create a login form and integrate it with the backend API to authenticate users. Ensure error messages are displayed for failed logins.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test login flow with valid and invalid credentials.

subtasks.title: Manage JWT Tokens with localStorage
subtasks.description: Implement JWT token storage and retrieval using localStorage.
subtasks.details: Store JWT tokens in localStorage upon successful login and retrieve them for authenticated API requests. Ensure tokens are cleared on logout.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify tokens are stored and retrieved correctly. Test token clearance on logout.

subtasks.title: Develop Profile Management for User Details
subtasks.description: Create functionality for users to update their profile information.
subtasks.details: Implement a profile management page where users can update their personal details. Integrate with the backend to save changes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test profile updates for accuracy and persistence.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for registration form development, login functionality, JWT token management, and profile management.

tasks.title: Implement Job Discovery & Search
tasks.description: Enable job search and filtering for workers and guests.
tasks.details: Develop the home page with a search bar. Implement job listing with filters for skill, location, and price. Use the API to fetch and display job data.
tasks.testStrategy: Test search functionality with various filters. Ensure job listings update correctly based on search criteria.

subtasks.title: Develop Search Bar on Home Page
subtasks.description: Create a search bar on the home page for job discovery.
subtasks.details: Implement a search bar allowing users to input keywords and initiate a job search. Ensure the design aligns with the existing home page layout.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test search bar input and submission functionality.

subtasks.title: Implement Job Listing with Filters
subtasks.description: Develop job listing with filters for skill, location, and price.
subtasks.details: Create a job listing section that displays jobs based on search criteria. Implement filters for skill, location, and price to refine search results.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that filters correctly narrow down job listings based on user input.

subtasks.title: Integrate API for Job Data Fetching
subtasks.description: Use the API to fetch and display job data on the home page.
subtasks.details: Integrate with the backend API to retrieve job data. Ensure data is displayed correctly in the job listing section and updates dynamically based on search and filter criteria.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API integration to ensure job data is fetched and displayed correctly.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Break down into subtasks for search bar implementation, job listing with filters, and API integration for data fetching.

tasks.title: Create Job Detail & Application Management
tasks.description: Develop job detail page and application actions for workers and employers.
tasks.details: Build the job detail page to display job information. Implement application actions for workers to apply and employers to manage applications. Handle business rule errors gracefully.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify job details display correctly. Test application actions and ensure error messages are clear and accurate.

subtasks.title: Develop Job Detail Page
subtasks.description: Create a page to display detailed job information.
subtasks.details: Design and implement the job detail page layout. Ensure all job information is displayed clearly. Integrate with the backend to fetch job data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that all job details are displayed correctly and data is fetched from the backend.

subtasks.title: Implement Application Actions for Workers
subtasks.description: Enable workers to apply for jobs and manage their applications.
subtasks.details: Develop the application form for workers. Implement functionality to submit applications and track their status. Handle form validation and error messages.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the application submission process and ensure error messages are displayed for invalid inputs.

subtasks.title: Develop Application Management for Employers
subtasks.description: Create features for employers to manage job applications.
subtasks.details: Implement functionality for employers to view, accept, or reject applications. Ensure actions are logged and notifications are sent to workers.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that employers can manage applications and that actions trigger appropriate notifications.

tasks.title: Develop Worker Dashboard & Experience

subtasks.title: Design Dashboard UI Layout

subtasks.title: Implement Application Management Feature

subtasks.details: Use React to build components for viewing and managing job applications. Integrate with the backend API to fetch and update application data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test application management features with mock data and API integration.

subtasks.title: Develop Review Display Component
subtasks.description: Create components to display reviews and ratings on the dashboard.
subtasks.details: Build React components to show average ratings and individual reviews. Ensure data is fetched from the API and displayed correctly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify reviews are displayed accurately and update dynamically.

subtasks.title: Integrate Certificate Status and Upload

tasks.testStrategy: Verify job posting and management features. Ensure applications can be accepted or rejected correctly.
